name: Galactic Guardian (davsza)
description:
Galactic Guardian!

Enjoy the game with the new features:

  • 3+1 levels, containing a training level, and 3 playable levels from which the last one is boss level
  • With each level, the game gets harder, enemies become stronger and your ship gets weaker (due to the previouss fights)
  • Full 'How to play' in the menu, in case you are missing something
  • Modified player movement and shooting
  • New types of enemies (kamikaze, fast chaser, multiple shooter), with different lives and shooting abilities
  • New elements to the map, containing planets and alien space stations
  • Re-designed in-game menu, reset level button

Try it and enjoy!

Credits: Szabolcs Dávid
